siteMetadata.title: Blog by Jing
siteMetadata.subtitle: A test -loving Web developer and Python enthusiast.

frontmatter.title: Gatsby博客环境搭建
frontmatter.description: Gatsby是一个基于React的、免费开源的、用于搭建讲台站点的框架。主要应用React和GraphQL技术，使用Gatsby搭建一个简单的静态站点，是一个很好的学习历程。本文主要讲述如何从零搭建一个简单的个人博客构建的过程，也是自己学习和解决一些bug的过程

frontmatter.title: Humane Typography in the Digital Age
frontmatter.description: An Essay on Typography by Eric Gill takes the reader back to the year 1930. The year when a conflict between two worlds came to its term. The machines of the industrial world finally took over the handicrafts.
